G-1.name: G-1
G-1.requirement: Reach Lv 420 on 4 players, and keep this Constellation a secret... just a lil' secret between you and me... @ Progress:{/}

G-4.name: G-4
G-4.requirement: Defeat all Woodlins without a helmet or weapon equipped on 3 players. You must enter the map without helmet or weapon. @ Progress:{/}

G-7.name: G-7
G-7.requirement: Successfully gather Effervescent Logs on 5 players @ Progress:{/}

G-3.requirement: Reach this star on 10 players @ Progress:{/}

G-5.name: G-5
G-5.requirement: Run from left portal to right portal without touching a lantern spirit, on 4 players. All mobs must be alive when you start. @ Progress:{/}

G-2.name: G-2
G-2.requirement: Take no damage on 3 players, you need 28521 DEF to be damageless @ Progress:{/}

G-9.name: G-9
G-9.requirement: Defeat 100 Samurai Guardians within 100 seconds of entering the map, on 8 players @ Progress:{/}

G-8.name: G-8
G-8.requirement: Defeat all Royal Eggs before any respawn on 7 players @ Progress:{/}

G-6.name: G-6

requirement: Defeat 100 Wurms in under 100 sec from entering on 5 players @ Progress:{/}
